title: Transferred League to a new PC. DirectX DLL Error
body:
I need some help. It keeps giving me this dll error when I start a game.

League Of Legends.exe - System Error

The program can't start because d3dx9_39.dll is missing from your computer. Try reinstalling the program to fix this problem

replies.body:
This error usually crops up if there are some missing DirectX files that League heavily relies on. You should be able to resolve this after running all available windows updates and installing [**this standalone package**](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=34429) from Microsoft.

Let me know if this worked!
